includedAssets.title: A Tale Of Two Sisters
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep1 - A Tale Of Two Sisters
includedAssets.synopsis: A mysterious woman with dangerous ice powers arrives in Storybrooke through Zelena's time portal.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A mysterious woman with dangerous ice powers arrives in Storybrooke through Zelena's time portal.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A mysterious woman with dangerous ice powers arrives in Storybrooke through Zelena's time portal.

includedAssets.title: White Out
includedAssets.synopsis: Emma is put in danger when Elsa accidentally traps her in an ice cave, while flashbacks show Anna helping David take on powerful warlord Bo Peep.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Emma is put in danger when Elsa accidentally traps her in an ice cave, while flashbacks show Anna helping David take on powerful warlord Bo Peep.

includedAssets.title: Rocky Road
includedAssets.synopsis: The town turns on Elsa after Marian is attacked with a freezing spell, unaware that there is another new arrival with icy powers in their midst.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The town turns on Elsa after Marian is attacked with a freezing spell, unaware that there is another new arrival with icy powers in their midst.

includedAssets.title: The Apprentice
includedAssets.synopsis: Hook gets more than he bargained for when he asks Gold to restore his hand, while flashbacks show Anna making a deal with Rumplestiltskin.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hook gets more than he bargained for when he asks Gold to restore his hand, while flashbacks show Anna making a deal with Rumplestiltskin.

includedAssets.title: Breaking Glass
includedAssets.synopsis: Regina is forced to team up with Emma to find the Snow Queen, while flashbacks show a young Emma befriending a fellow orphan.

includedAssets.title: Family Business
includedAssets.synopsis: After discovering a shocking connection between her and the Snow Queen, Emma grows even more determined to uncover her plan.

includedAssets.title: The Snow Queen
includedAssets.synopsis: Emma captures the Snow Queen, but things don't go to plan, while Regina struggles to stay away from Robin Hood.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Emma captures the Snow Queen, but things don't go to plan, while Regina struggles to stay away from Robin Hood.

includedAssets.title: Smash The Mirror: Part 1
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep8 - Smash The Mirror: Part 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Unable to control her powers, Emma turns to Gold. In a flashback to Arendelle, the Snow Queen tries to divide the sisters.

includedAssets.title: Smash The Mirror: Part 2
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep9 - Smash The Mirror: Part 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Everyone races to find Emma before she can give up her powers to Gold and fulfil his plan. Robin Hood discovers an important clue.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Everyone races to find Emma before she can give up her powers to Gold and fulfil his plan. Robin Hood discovers an important clue.

includedAssets.title: Fall
includedAssets.synopsis: With the Spell of Shattered Sight approaching, the Storybrooke residents prepare themselves, while Elsa searches for her sister.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With the Spell of Shattered Sight approaching, the Storybrooke residents prepare themselves, while Elsa searches for her sister.

includedAssets.title: Shattered Sight
includedAssets.synopsis: With Storybrooke cursed again, Emma and Elsa must find a way to remove their ribbons and end the spell before the town destroys itself.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: The fourth season of the hit fantasy drama introduces characters from Disney's Frozen, as a mysterious woman with icy powers throws Storybrooke into chaos. Jennifer Morrison and Ginnifer Goodwin star.

includedIn.title: Once Upon A Time
includedIn.synopsis: After her long-lost son suddenly reappears, Emma Swan is taken to Storybrooke, a mysterious town whose residents bear a striking resemblance to fairy-tale characters. There she must find her parents, defeat a wicked queen and break a dark curse.
